name: Shoelace Technologies, Inc.
description: Provider of an artificial intelligence-powered virtual assistant tool intended to help brands implement customer journey marketing. The company's tool helps e-commerce merchants launch retargeting campaigns on social media as well as takes visitors through a brand experience after they leave the store and keeps them engaged with a sequence of ad experiences, enabling brands to recapture visitors who abandon their website and increase sales.
one_liner: Provider of an artificial intelligence-powered virtual assistant tool intended to help brands implement customer journey marketing. The company's tool helps e-commerce merchants launch retargeting campaigns on social media as well as takes visitors through a brand experience after they leave the store and keeps them engaged with a sequence of ad experiences, enabling brands to recapture visitors who abandon their website and increase sales.
